views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11 and 12

Smootheaders11 Hides (also Disables) and Makes Smaller (so Rounder) the Headers Content View from the Today View and the Notifications/Notifications Center.

The Item is now out from the Stage of My Repository.

Configure options from Settings.

See Screenshots below.

Testing thanks to my Brother @lorenzo_noide and Tester @_Easy_Z_.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.1.0 - Added support for arm64e/A12. Version 1.0.6
- Added the option to Make Clean the Headers View.
- Added the option to Make Bold the Headers Text (thanks a lot sinfool).
- Added the option to Make Italic the Headers Text (thanks a lot sinfool).


Version 1.0.5
- Added some Colors :-) (libcolorpicker Dependency).

-Now you can Custom Select the Notifications Content Text Colors for the LockScreen, Notification Center and Banners (thanks sinfool).
Version 1.0.4
- Added the option to Reduce the Space between the Widgets (Requested on Mail).
- Added the option to Make Transparent the Headers Background.
- Label Prefs Change and Fix.
Version 1.0.3
- Added the option to Remove the No Older Notifications Text from the LockScreen and Notification Center (Implemented My Tweak coyNotif Available on My Repository).
Version 1.0.2
- Added the option to Square the Headers.
- Added the option to Make Transparent the Headers Background.
- Added some colors in the Preferences Panel :)
- Changes in Prefs.


Version 1.0.1
- Added the Preferences Panel with options to configure (as Requested via Mail).
- Added the option to Hide the Titles Text (tip by sinfool).
- Added the option to Hide the Icons Text.
- Added the option to Hide the Dates Text.
- Added the option to Move Left the Subtitles.
